title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Nominate Personnel to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
April 3, 2018
Rubydee Calvert of Wyoming to be a Member of the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, as the Public TV Stations Representative, for the remainder of a six-year term expiring January 31, 2022.Laura Gore Ross of New York to be a Member of the Corporation for Public Broadcasting for the remainder of a six-year term expiring January 31, 2022.
